Title: Finding Accurate Benchmark Accounts
Content: Finding accurate benchmark accounts on Xiaohongshu is essential for creating effective content strategies. The key principle is to avoid using the search function to find these accounts. Searching often brings up outdated posts that are no longer recommended by the system. For example, if you search for 'jeans,' you might find high-engagement posts from last year, but these accounts may no longer be active or recommended by the system. Instead, focus on accounts that the system currently recommends. These accounts are being actively promoted to other users, indicating that their content is currently popular and engaging. To find these accounts, scroll through your feed and look for posts with high engagement, such as likes and comments. Click on these posts and examine the account's recent activity and engagement metrics. This method ensures that you are benchmarking against accounts that are relevant and currently performing well, which can provide more accurate insights for your content strategy.

Title: Leveraging System Recommendations for Content Strategy
Content: Leveraging system recommendations is a powerful strategy for identifying successful content on Xiaohongshu. Title: Practical Steps for Identifying High-Performing Content
Content: Identifying high-performing content on Xiaohongshu involves a series of practical steps that can help you pinpoint what works best in your niche. Start by scrolling through your feed and looking for posts with high engagement, such as likes and comments. Click on these posts to examine the account's recent activity and overall performance. Pay attention to metrics like the number of purchases or interactions within a specific timeframe, as these can indicate the popularity and effectiveness of the content. For example, a post with a title like 'Summer Must-Have Jeans' that has garnered thousands of likes and comments is likely performing well. Analyze the elements of these high-performing posts, including the visuals, captions, and overall layout. This analysis can provide valuable insights into what makes content engaging and effective. By regularly reviewing and analyzing high-performing content, you can identify trends and strategies that resonate with your target audience. Applying these insights to your own content can help improve your engagement and reach on the platform.
